description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes and styling the components of a modern Tic Tac Toe application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the App component, including background color, text color, and layout properties such as text alignment and minimum height.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the App component, including background color, layout properties, font size, and transitions.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the App component, including size and animation properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the App component, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover/active effects.
